column4: I need some help, I have the "gave up waiting for root device" problem, I can get onto linux after typing exit after a certain amount of time, but how do I delay the increase the time it takes to wait?
i think there are a couple of boot options you can use something like rootwait
rootwait        [KNL] Wait (indefinitely) for root device to show up.
and rootdelay=      [KNL] Delay (in seconds) to pause before attempting to mount the root filesystem
if you want it to stick add it to /etc/default/grub to thwe string that contains quiet and splash
and run  sudo update-grub like ActionParsnip points out
i t will add that option to all the kernels
